src:
VIDEO: Dončić junak zmage Dallasa, spet piše zgodovino
Dosegel je 11. trojni dvojček.
04 Nov 2019, 06:42 by STA, S. U.
DALLAS – Luka Dončić nadaljuje z bleščečimi predstavami v NBA. Dončić je bil najboljši igralec tekme za zmago Dallasa s 131 : 111 proti Clevelandu. Dosegel je svoj 11. trojni dvojček v tej ligi (v 78 tekmah) in drugega zaporedoma z 29 točkami, 15 asistencami in 14 skoki.Dončić je imel 15 podaj tudi na prejšnji tekmi proti moštvu Los Angeles Lakers. Dallas je tekmo po podaljšku izgubil, Dončić pa je dobil udarec v glavo in so mu morali šivati rano, a je nadaljeval tekmo.



Enajst trojnih dvojčkov je tudi največ v NBA pri košarkarjih, ki še niso dopolnili 21. rojstnega dne. Earvin Magic Johnson, ki je držal prejšnji rekord, jih je v Dončićevi starosti dosegel denimo sedem.
Zmaga tudi za Miami
V pretekli noči se je zmage veselil tudi Goran Dragić, ki je za zmago Miamija proti Houstonu (129 : 100) dosegel 15 točk, 4 podaje in 2 skoka.
text:
VIDEO: Dallas' Hero of Victory, writes history again
He reached the 11th triple twin.
04 Nov 2019, 06:42 by STA, S. U.
DALLAS - Luka Doncic continues to shine in the NBA. Doncic was the best player of the match to win Dallas 131-111 against Cleveland. He reached his 11th triple-double in this league (in 78 games) and second in a row with 29 points, 15 assists and 14 rebounds. Dallas lost the match after overtime, but Doncic got hit in the head and had to be sutured early but continued the match.



Eleven triple-doubles are also the highest in the NBA for basketball players who have not yet completed their 21st birthday. Earvin Magic Johnson, who held the previous record, reached seven in Doncic's age, for example.
He also wins for Miami
Last night, Goran Dragic was also looking forward to scoring 15 points, 4 rebounds and 2 rebounds to win Miami against Houston (129-100).
